original_text: And he took the blind man by the hand and led him out of the village, and when he had spit on his eyes and laid his hands on him, he asked him, “Do you see anything?”
korean_text: 예수께서 맹인의 손을 붙잡으시고 마을 밖으로 데리고 나가사 눈에 침을 뱉으시며 그에게 안수하시고 무엇이 보이느냐 물으시니

sentences.original_text: And he took the blind man by the hand
and led him out of the village
and when he had spit on his eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그의 눈에 침을 뱉었을 때

sentences.original_text: and laid his hands on him
